name: @aitube/clapper-monorepo
description: A monorepo for the Clapper project. Individual packages are in the packages directory.

scripts.build:all: npm run build:clap && npm run build:timeline && npm run build:client && npm run build:io && npm run build:colors && npm run build:engine && npm run build:broadway && npm run build:clapper-services && npm run build:app
scripts.test:all: cd packages/clap && npm test && cd ../timeline && npm test && cd ../client && npm test && cd ../io && npm test && cd ../colors && npm test && cd ../engine && npm test && cd ../broadway && npm test && cd ../clapper-services && npm test && cd ../app && npm test
